name: Guard Mantis
effectText: You can pay 1000 LP; Special Summon this card from your hand in Defense Position, but while it is face-up in the Monster Zone, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except Insect monsters. During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Insect monster you control; change its battle position. You can only use each effect of "Guard Mantis" once per turn.
